title: Bug 148219Wrong warning is reported
description: I used ajdt1.3.1foreclipse3.1.zip on Eclipse 3.1.2.Below is my aspectj code.public aspect MyMessages {pointcut getResourceString(String key): args(key, ..) &&call ( CommonPlugin.getResourceString(String, ..));String around(String key):getResourceString(key) {return key;}}The warning message isThe parameter key is never read.See my screenshot.
